abstract: Creates a `ContentUnavailableView` instance that conveys a search state.

declaration.code: static var search: ContentUnavailableView<SearchUnavailableContent.Label, SearchUnavailableContent.Description, SearchUnavailableContent.Actions> { get }

overview:
## Discussion

A `ContentUnavailableView` initialized with this static member is expected to be contained within a searchable view hierarchy. Such a configuration enables the search query to be parsed into the view’s description.

For example, consider the usage of this static member in *ContactsListView*:

items.description: Creates a `ContentUnavailableView` instance that conveys a search state.
items.name: search(text:)

title: search
